item.title: [HCM-473] Jump view on action
item.description:
I have added jump view on action

<ACTIONS>
<ACTION jump.view="20:0" fnct="leave_aplication" title="Confirm Leave">Confirm Leave</ACTION>
<ACTION jump.view="20:0" approval="1" fnct="leave_special" action="Special Application" title="Special Application">Special Application</ACTION>
<ACTION jump.view="10:0" approval="2" fnct="leave_special" action="Save Draft" title="Save Draft">Save Draft</ACTION>
</ACTIONS>

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I have updated this on demo hcm
Actions are not being loaded at all across the app.
No error message on any of the logs.

Actions are showing

URL https://demo.dewcis.com/hcm/dataserver   

Unsuccessful application

ViewLink 10:0&action=0   

Action actions   

Data [\{"id":"1"}]   

Response {"ResultMsg":"ERROR: Apply leave within correct period\n  Where: PL/pgSQL function leave_aplication(character varying,character varying,character varying) line 70 at RAISE; ","ResultCode":0}

 

Successful application

ViewLink 10:0&action=0

ViewLink 10:0&action=0   

Action actions    Data [\{"id":"60"}]   

Response {"ResultMsg":"Leave applied; ","ResultCode":0}

 

I need a result code to differentiate between a successful and failed application. The only difference is currently the error message.

item.title: [BB-83] Create a marketing campaigns module
item.description:
Create a marketing campaigns module to;
